About.pageTitle: About PT Amara Cisadane | Professional Environmental Consultancy
About.pageDescription: PT Amara Cisadane is a trusted environmental consultant. We provide comprehensive EIA, KTPA, and ATPA services. Contact us for your environmental solutions.
About.shortDescription: PT Amara Cisadane is a Limited Liability Company focused on management consulting, technical services, and other services for sanitation and the environment. Our operations are supported by registration as an AMDAL Document Preparation Service Provider with No. 0085/LPJ/AMDAL-1/LRK/KLH.
About.title: Discover Our Organization
About.description: The company is entirely managed by resources from various disciplines with experience and skills in their respective fields. Each personnel member holds qualifications as AMDAL preparers (KTPA & ATPA) and technical expertise in geophysics, chemistry, biology, socio-cultural studies, public health, traffic, and more.
About.visionDescription: To become a competent and professional environmental consultancy company and a forefront advocate for sustainable and environmentally conscious development.
About.missionDescription:
• Providing environmental consulting services in accordance with applicable policies and regulations to meet customer needs and satisfaction.
  • Continuously enhancing personnel capabilities as team leaders, members, or experts in all supporting areas.
  • Improving the company's performance and capacity to deliver high-quality, on-time results.
  • Delivering the best environmental consulting services to achieve client satisfaction while upholding the values of Pancasila, science, culture, ethics, and professionalism.
About.experienceDescription: Showcasing our dedication to excellence and impactful environmental solutions.

FAQ.title: Frequently Asking Questions
FAQ.description: A comprehensive guide to commonly asked questions and their answers.

question-1.question: What products are offered by PT Amara Cisadane?
question-1.answer: PT Amara Cisadane offers consultancy services for environmental document preparation, technical studies and approvals, SLO (Operational Feasibility Certificate), and wastewater treatment plant (WWTP) planning. Additionally, PT Amara Cisadane has a subsidiary specializing in the design, construction, and installation of water and wastewater treatment systems (WWTP).

question-2.question: Where is PT Amara Cisadane located?
question-2.answer: PT Amara Cisadane is an environmental consultancy company located in Serpong, South Tangerang, Banten. However, we have extensive experience in various cities and even across multiple islands in Indonesia.

question-3.question: Is PT Amara Cisadane registered with the Ministry of Environment and Forestry (KLH)?
question-3.answer: Yes, PT Amara Cisadane is registered with the Ministry of Environment and Forestry (KLH) as an Environmental Impact Assessment (AMDAL) Document Preparation Service Provider (LPJP) with registration number 0085/LPJ/AMDAL-1/LRK/KLH.

question-4.question: Does PT Amara Cisadane have a certified team and experts?
question-4.answer: Yes, all team members and experts at PT Amara Cisadane are certified with AMDAL A, AMDAL B, Environmental Impact Assessment Preparation Team Member (ATPA), Environmental Impact Assessment Preparation Team Leader (KTPA), and other supporting certifications relevant to their respective fields of expertise.

question-5.question: Does PT Amara Cisadane have an environmental laboratory accredited by KAN (National Accreditation Committee)?
question-5.answer: PT Amara Cisadane is supported by PT Kehatilab Indonesia as an environmental laboratory provider accredited by KAN (National Accreditation Committee) with accreditation number LP-852-IDN. It is also registered as an Environmental Laboratory with the Ministry of Environment and Forestry (KLH) under Competency Registration Number 0078/LPJ/LABLING-1/LRK/KLH.
